title: About Us: Footnotes - Northwestern University
content: Issued twice each year, Footnotes magazine keeps library supporters informed about our work and the many ways we support the learning and research of students and faculty. Dean of Libraries and Charles Deering McCormick University Librarian Xuemao Wang xuemao.wang@northwestern.edu Director of Development Jennifer Mullman ’99 jmullman@northwestern.edu Director of Marketing and Communication Clare Roccaforte c-roccaforte@northwestern.edu Current Editor and Writer Drew Scott ’92 drew.scott@northwestern.edu
